en.name: Creation
en.description: This phase is the work by hand of crocheting. It’s a slow process that requires time. Each stitch is made by hand interlocking the yarn with the crochet hook.

it.name: Creation
it.description: This phase is the work by hand of crocheting. It’s a slow process that requires time. Each stitch is made by hand interlocking the yarn with the crochet hook.
